data.text:
@FlightEx_YT Thanks for your kind words, such reviews brighten our day!

See you on board again soon!

Meet our NEW routes 👇

data.text: Since the launch of the internal airBaltic Leaders for Future (ALFA) program in 2020, almost 200 managers and high potential employees have developed their skills and talents to contribute to the future success of airBaltic ✈️ https://t.co/F4EhtFD78b

@realNepareizais @Talis_L Ja pasažiera rīcībā ir visi ceļošanai nepieciešamie dokumenti un tas legāli jau atrodās Šengenas valsts ietvaros ar derīgu Šengenas vīzu - lidojumu var veikt Šengenas ietvaros.
@louisdonaldson_ Glad to hear you enjoyed it 💚✈️ Have a lovely weekend!
@realNepareizais @Talis_L Labdien! Krievijas Federācijas pilsoņi netiek uzņemti airBaltic reisos, kuros tiek šķērsota Šengenas robeža, tajā skaitā arī lidojumos uz Rīgu.

We're incredibly honoured to receive the Skytrax award for the Best Airline in Eastern Europe in 2022 🏆 What makes this award special is that it is based on the recognition from our passengers who truly enjoy the airBaltic experience ✈️💚 https://t.co/lJg2aVxTH9

@ieva_lobaciute Majority of passengers reach flights without issues. However, if such situation would occur, we kindly advise you to contact our Reservations department and our team will advise on this individually.

@ieva_lobaciute Hello! We can confirm that our check-in desks at the airport opens approximately 2-3 hours before flight departure time. Due to airport’s staff shortage unfortunately we are not able to open these counters much earlier.
As for security queues, please contact airport for details.

urls.title: airBaltic celebrates third season of its internal leadership program – ALFA
urls.description: The Latvian airline airBaltic celebrates the start of the third season of its internal airBaltic Leaders for Future (ALFA) program in an educational and knowledge-sharing event on the future of work and emerging trends in employee retention and belonging.

urls.title: airBaltic doubles number of mobile bookings compared to 2021
urls.description: Latvian airline airBaltic reports that during the first eight months of 2022, the number of mobile bookings has more than doubled compared to the same period last year.

data.text: During the first eight months of 2022, the number of mobile bookings has more than doubled compared to the same period last year! 📱🌍 In total, 30% of all reservations made on the airBaltic website were done on a mobile device: https://t.co/mdG6Bk5j2d https://t.co/GVFy2Ne49b
@Jenotsons @Kilkuts Labvakar! Mūsu mājaslapa šādus datus neprasa ne biļeti iegādājoties, ne arī reģistrējoties lidojumiem, piemēram, Šengenas zonas ietvaros.

@edinjambo We kindly inform you that the contacts can be seen in yesterday’s tweet, however we will add them here again: https://t.co/yfHxhT6QOb

Thank you!

@edinjambo We’re sorry to hear this. Unfortunately, the social media support team won’t be able to advise as alternatives are offered by our agents. Please get back in touch with the Call Centre agents who will be able to provide detailed information. Thank you for understanding!

We're lucky to be surrounded by incredible people 💚 Every year we thank our long-term employees for their loyalty and dedication. They have been with us for 10, 15, 20, and even 25 years, and it is amazing to see that love for aviation is still in the air ✈️ To many more years! https://t.co/yItSIpyXNZ

urls.title: airBaltic adds daily flights from Tampere to Amsterdam for winter season
urls.description: airBaltic has published its flight schedule for the upcoming winter season that will start on October 31, 2022. The airline plans to connect Tampere to five destinations, offering its first-ever daily flights from Tampere to Amsterdam.

data.text: We have published our flight schedule from Tampere for the upcoming winter season which will start on October 31, 2022 ✈️ The highlight of our upcoming Tampere winter schedule are our first-ever daily flights from Tampere to Amsterdam! Read more here: https://t.co/mZTSDlLB0i https://t.co/mrLXEqvqUJ
@catsway 💚

@edinjambo We are glad to hear that everything was sorted out! Unfortunately we won't be able to comment on such details of airport infrastructure. We kindly advise to get in touch with the agents at the airport to clarify these details. Thank you.

urls.title: airBaltic carries 38% more passengers in August
urls.description: During August 2022, Latvian airline airBaltic has carried 386 500 passengers or by 38% more than during the same period last year. In August 2022, airBaltic performed 3 690 flights – by 20% more than in August 2021.

data.text: During the sunlit month of August, we have carried 386 500 passengers! ✈️ That's by 38% more than during the same period last year. We want to thank all the passengers who trusted us with their travels and continued to choose us through this season: https://t.co/E0BNXRgd9f https://t.co/E1NIdE1GTE

urls.title: 8 students graduate airBaltic Pilot Academy

data.text: Today 8 students graduated from airBaltic Pilot Academy, receiving a commercial pilot license upon completion of the full-time airline transport pilot program!✈️ In addition, the largest group of 15 new students, began their professional pilot studies: https://t.co/xoSIyERORh https://t.co/vPGerA5zfD

urls.title: airBaltic increases revenue threefold in the first half of 2022
urls.description: Due to increased travel demand, the unaudited consolidated financial results of airBaltic group for the first six months of 2022 show a significantly increased revenue of EUR 191.5 million – 270% more than the same period last year.

data.text: Due to increased travel demand, the unaudited consolidated financial results of airBaltic group for the first six months of 2022 show a significantly increased revenue of EUR 191.5 million – 270% more than the same period last year: https://t.co/MizffFTnCJ https://t.co/hsMWjeQxtK

@sanmikela Labdien! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu. Informējam, ka sistēma automātiski izsūta šādu paziņojumu gadījumā, ja neesat pabeigusi rezervāciju (pārbaudot lidojuma detaļas, vai cenas konkrētajam maršrutam un nerezervējot to). Paldies.
@KristinJaunzeme Prieks, ka Jums tāds prieks 💚 Gaidīsim mūsu lidojumos arī nākotnē!

urls.title: airBaltic welcomes its 50 millionth passenger
urls.description: Today, on August 31, the Latvian airline airBaltic welcomed its 50 millionth passenger since the founding of the airline in 1995.

data.text: Today we welcomed our 50 millionth passenger! 🥳 This day was filled with lots of smiles, joy and “thank-yous”. The biggest thank you goes out to all the passengers who have been a part of this significant milestone 💚 To many more happy flights together: https://t.co/29yNIlgZTv https://t.co/TSCeAL1Z0n

urls.title: Submit a claim | Contact us | airBaltic
urls.description: Left your belongings on the plane? Was your baggage delayed? You can submit a claim about baggage, flight irregularities and more to airBaltic online.

data.text: @MandimanM Hello! Business class is provided on all airBaltic flights and routes.

Today, 33 years ago, two million people from Baltic countries came together and united hand in hand to create a Chain of Freedom - the Baltic Way. Let this day always remind the strength of our Baltic spirit and the importance of freedom 🇪🇪🇱🇻🇱🇹

📸 Kārlis Dambrāns https://t.co/ElhffgmIdT
@BenFriend74 @HelsinkiAirport Hello! Our apologies for this unpleasant situation. May we kindly ask you to DM us privately more details such as baggage irregularity reference number?

urls.title: LATE SUMMER SALE
urls.description: Great prices for flights up until December!

data.text:
There are still a few days left to make this summer last longer! 🌞 Plan your autumn getaways and book your flights for very special prices 👉 https://t.co/1rs8zE5nWm

Book 🎫 16.08 - 25.08.2022
Travel ✈️ 01.09 - 16.12.2022 https://t.co/j6q32KmLWp
@hurricanemk1c Hello! Thanks for your message. Please be informed that our check-in desks open 2 hours before the scheduled departure time. Thank you.
@Ana_77_JK Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us. By the information currently available to us, check-in counter was opened at 07:00 (local time). thank you.
@Get_Chrome Hello! We’re sorry to hear you were not satisfied with the service. Please see our comment here: https://t.co/YKZiVZf9T4

urls.title: LATE SUMMER SALE
urls.description: Great prices for flights up until December!

data.text:
Prolong your summer with a little treat! 🍦 Till Monday, indulge in our sale and while purchasing the ticket, add baggage with a 30% discount! 🧳️

✈️ Summerish flight prices are available here: https://t.co/oep2I1JuFM https://t.co/WdxMEwAPRc
@NadimJanjua Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us. We regret to hear of such unpleasant situation. May we kindly ask you to share the flight number with us? We will check! Thank you.
@adibaldry @SimonCalder Hello! We checked with the team and were informed that you should receive it soon - within the upcoming week. Thanks for your patience and understanding.

data.text: It's the middle of August and our @Airbus A220 keeps on going up, up, up through the summer season!  ✈️ When is the next time you're joining us on an adventure? 🤩 https://t.co/TelSA4OwBL
@enina_zane Labvakar! Lūdzam DM ziņā atsūtīt sīkākas detaļas par rezervāciju, ko vēlaties iegādāties, tās maršrutu, kā arī pasažieru vārdiem/uzvārdiem un kļūdas paziņojumiem, ko novērojat.
